The best new widgets for Android - ready for ICS and Honeycomb!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
** HEADS UP - IMPORTANT TIPS:
If you don't see widgets right away:
=> HONEYCOMB / ICS devices: do a quick restart
=> APP2SD users: HD Widgets won't work on external SD card
MODDED TABLETS: require ICS mod/update to use tablet widgets & activities. (Gingerbread & earlier will only show phone widgets & layout.)
